content:
benjamin Tully Editor in ChiefJune  

Update Condric A PERIOD Sanders was found not guilty on all charges PERIOD



Three Eastern students have been indicted by a Coles County grand jury on charges of sexual assault PERIOD

Louis A PERIOD Taylor Antwan G PERIOD Oliver and Condric A PERIOD Sanders have all been indicted in separate cases that States Attorney Steve Ferguson said are not related PERIOD The charges include engaging in intercourse with a women by force without consent or in one case both PERIOD

According to court records Taylor whose home is in Chicago had yet to post bond which Ferguson said would result in a court appearance this morning PERIOD

Taylor is accused of engaging in sexual intercourse with a women on April  without her consent and was arrested June  PERIOD

Taylor a psychology major was a member of the wrestling team PERIOD

Oliver  was arrested on May  and was granted permission to return to his home in Florida until his July  court date after posting  percent of a  bond PERIOD

Court records indicated Oliver pleaded not guilty after being accused of forcing sexual intercourse with a women and has issued a request for a jury trial PERIOD

Oliver a family and consumer sciences major was a starting defensive back last fall on Easterns football squad PERIOD

Sanders  of Rockford is accused of forcing intercourse and engaging in a sexual act when the women did not consent on Feb PERIOD  PERIOD

Sanders is free after posting  percent of a  bond and appeared in court on June  PERIOD His court date was continued to July  after his lawyer failed to appear PERIOD

Sanders is a sociology major and is a student manager for Easterns basketball team PERIOD

All three men have been issued a court order to avoid contact with the alleged victims and their families PERIOD
